meanings.definition: Below the best or most favorable level.
meanings.sent1: The suboptimum solution was not ideal for our problem.
meanings.sent2: Using a suboptimum strategy may lead to less success.
meanings.sent3: It was suboptimum to wear sandals in the snow.
meanings.sent4: The suboptimum performance of the car left much to be desired.
meanings.sent5: The suboptimum quality of the product was evident in its durability.

meanings.definition: Not reaching the highest level of efficiency or effectiveness.
meanings.sent1: The suboptimum results were not what we had hoped for.
meanings.sent2: Choosing a suboptimum tool can slow down the process.
meanings.sent3: It was suboptimum to use a fork to eat soup.
meanings.sent4: The suboptimum speed of the internet made browsing frustrating.
meanings.sent5: The suboptimum decision-making process led to delays in the project.
